hero.text: We serve Connecticut through smart, easy-to-use digital services that our citizens will love.
hero.cta_text: Join the Connecticut Digital Service team

announcements.title: The DMV gets Real
announcements.description: We helped the DMV get ready for changes required by Real ID.

focus.text: CT Digital Service is leading a digital transformation in the state. The work is currently focused in four areas:
focus.cta_text: Learn more about our current projects and initiatives

quote.text: I will take the lead by investing in the first all-digital government, and reverse engineer every transaction from the taxpayer’s shoes. The entry point to Connecticut will be through its digital front door, a one-stop-shop for everything current and prospective citizens need from their government. We will be online, not in line. It won’t be done overnight, but let’s start today.
quote.title: The Connecticut Digital Service is helping government work more efficiently.

frontmatter.title: Listen to our users.
frontmatter.description: We seek to understand and prioritize the needs of our citizens, businesses and state employees.

frontmatter.title: Ensure services are accessible to all.
frontmatter.description: As stewards of the public’s trust and data, we follow best practices that ensure personal information is safe and services are accessible to everyone.

frontmatter.title: Grow a culture of collaboration.
frontmatter.description: We work across agencies so that together, we can deliver results that put our citizens first.

frontmatter.title: Move swiftly, and share what we learn.
frontmatter.description: We won’t reinvent the wheel. We improve services by building on what works and developing standards that can be put into practice across the state.

frontmatter.title: Customer Experience
frontmatter.description: Citizens deserve a compassionate, simple-to-use government that addresses their needs. We’re delivering on this promise.

frontmatter.title: Talent Modernization
frontmatter.description: Transformation doesn't happen without the right skills and talent. We’re working to revamp the way we attract, retain, and empower our workforce.(Pssst - wanna join?)

frontmatter.title: Agile Procurement
frontmatter.description: We're adopting the latest procurement practices that increase the odds of project success while minimizing cost and risk.

frontmatter.title: Technology Platforms and Services
frontmatter.description: To improve the user experience, you might need to radically change what’s under the hood. We’re turbo-charging the engine.
